name: Dreams To Be seen
description:
Premise:

In this game, you are not a passing traveler anymore, you notice that people around you are real humans who also have emotions, characters, and dreams like you. After you realize this fact, you can start to investigate others’ internal worlds by touching their personal objects. Now, please enjoy exploring the dreams of people around you. This time, don’t ignore them again.

Control:

Try to drag or click on objects that can be interacted with.

ESC to quit.

This game is created for the ArtCenter College of Design’s 2021 fall Game Jam. 

Game developers:

Coding: Demi Liu, Charlotte Guo, Galina Zhu

Visual Art: Wenjun Xie, Demi Liu

Game Combination: Galina Zhu, Charlotte Guo, Demi Liu

Audio Reference: Galina Zhu

Game Thoughts: Wenjun Xie, Demi Liu, Charlotte Guo, Galina Zhu

Demi Liu is a term-3 Game Design student from ACCD.

Wenjun Xie and Charlotte Guo are both term-1 Game Design students from ACCD.

Galina is a term-1 Interaction Design student from ACCD.
